sentences.en: ‘He's clever at his business,’ Matilda said. ‘Clever my foot!’.
sentences.cn: “他做生意很精明，”马蒂尔达说。“精明个屁！”。

sentences.en: a perfect couple with the world at their feet.
sentences.cn: 广受崇敬的完美一对。

sentences.en: Don’t wipe your feet on the carpet!
sentences.cn: 别在地毯上蹭脚！

sentences.en: Four foot should be seen as an absolute minimum.
sentences.cn: 绝对不能比4英尺再少了。

sentences.en: He lost a foot when he was struck by a train.
sentences.cn: 他给火车撞伤，失去了一只脚。

sentences.en: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.en: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.cn: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

sentences.en: His twenty-five-foot boat was moored within sight of West Church.
sentences.cn: 他那条25英尺长的小船停泊在看得见西教堂的地方。

sentences.en: I asked the driver to put his foot down for Nagchukha.
sentences.cn: 我要求司机加大油门去那曲。

sentences.en: I can have a foot in both the creative and business camps.
sentences.cn: 我可同时涉足艺术与商业。

sentences.en: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.cn: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.en: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.cn: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.en: I left my car in a lay-by and set off on foot.
sentences.cn: 我把车留在路侧停车带，徒步而行。

sentences.en: I tried to reach the foot brakes but I couldn't.
sentences.cn: 我试图去够脚刹，但是没能踩到。

sentences.en: My foot hurts.
sentences.cn: 我脚痛。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: Raise one foot, curl the toes and point the foot down-wards.
sentences.cn: 抬起一只脚，弯曲脚趾，使脚尖朝下。

sentences.en: Richardson severed his right foot in a motorbike accident.
sentences.cn: 理查森在一次摩托车事故中失去了他的右脚。

sentences.en: She continued massaging her right foot, which was bruised and aching.
sentences.cn: 她继续按摩又肿又疼的右脚。

sentences.en: She had decked him out from head to foot in expensive clothes.
sentences.cn: 她用昂贵的服装把他从头到脚打扮一新。

sentences.en: She stood on the platform, her suitcase at her feet .
sentences.cn: 她站在月台上，手提箱放在脚边。

sentences.en: she was blown off her feet by the shock wave from the explosion.
sentences.cn: 她被爆炸的冲击波击倒。

sentences.en: Squeeze the foot with both hands, again to loosen up tight muscles.
sentences.cn: 双手捏脚，目的也是使紧张的肌肉松弛下来。

sentences.en: Stand straight and stretch the left hand to the right foot.
sentences.cn: 站直身体,伸左手够右脚.

sentences.en: the decision was taken on foot of advice from the Attorney General.
sentences.cn: 这项决定是因为司法部长的建议才得以采纳的。

sentences.en: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
sentences.cn: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.en: The woman detective shifted her stance from one foot to another.
sentences.cn: 女侦探改变了站姿，把重心从一只脚移到另一只脚。

sentences.en: you would like to sit at my feet and thus acquire my wisdom.
sentences.cn: 你欲拜我为师，从而得我之智。

sentences.en: Your foot falls off the pedal and you stall the car.
sentences.cn: 你的脚离开踏板，汽车便会熄火。

words.tran_cn: 英尺长度；连续镜头；以尺计算长度
基础；立足处；社会关系；合计
步行；在…上行走；总计（foot的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 成功的第一步，成功地开始

phrases.phrase: get (或 start) off on the right (或 wrong) foot
phrases.tran_cn: （尤指任务或关系）开局好（或糟）

phrases.phrase: get one's feet under the table

phrases.tran_cn: 手脚一起；完全地；无微不至地

phrases.phrase: have (或 get) a foot in the door
have (或 keep) one's (或 both) feet on the ground
have a foot in both camps
have one foot in the grave
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，常 幽默)一脚已入土，行将就木
(非正式)算了吧，去你的吧（表示强烈反驳）
以好的方式开始；开张大吉；开门红
以不好的方式开始，出师不利

trans.tran_cn: 脚，底部，英尺(=12 英寸或 30.48 厘米)，脚步
trans.tran_en: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on
the part of your body that you stand on and walk on
